name: Beatcrash
description:
Beatcrash is a game that defeats a flying object according to the beat of music.
You definitely get a workout with this game.
You can catch flying weapons and a bomb.
This game uses your MP3 audio files.
The touch area can be set and currently 3 modes are available (Room Scale, Standing Mode, Sit Mode)
Supports English, Chinese, Japanese, and Korean.
You can also directly editing the language file in the language folder.

Vive controller
You can catch weapons and bomb by the trigger Button.
if you catch a weapon, the trigger button will be fixed.
When you want to throw away the weapon, pull and release the trigger button again.

Spectator Mode (high Computer Specifications)
Ctrl + Numpad 1 (enable)
Ctrl + Numpad 0 (disable)

Show Frame
Ctrl + F
